subject: All Star Games
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
Statue of Liberty
lead_paragraph: The eight-and-a-half-foot statues will soon crop up across New York, marking the beginning of the campaign to generate hype for Major League Baseball’s 79th All-Star Game.
snippet: The eight-and-a-half-foot statues will soon crop up across New York, marking the beginning of the campaign to generate hype for Major League Baseball’s 79th All-Star Game.
